Articles.Content:
so i just bought ksp on steam about a week ago.

 every time i try to load it up the game screen goes white and a new pop up message says kerbal space program has encountered and error and must close. 

i use steam and i am on windows 10.

please give info on how to fix his crash as i really want to play ksp.

Welcome to the forums, @DerpyShark35!

A few questions to help us diagnose your problem:

-Is your computer powerful enough to run KSP? Generally 4GB RAM is the lower limit. You can find the full system requirements on the KSP Wiki.

-Are you using the launcher? It hasn’t been supported officially for a while. Try using the ‘KSPx64.exe’ shortcut in the KSP directory.

-Are you using any mods? These increase the RAM usage of KSP, and you may not have enough. If you are using mods, make sure that they are updated to the version you’re using and that you have all of the required dependencies.

And could you post your log? There are instructions to find it here:

Important note: Please don’t post your whole log here. Add it on a file sharing service like dropbox and then link to it here instead.

I hope this helps! Good luck

Edited November 9, 2018 by RealKerbal3x
